fields.title: About The Author/Superhero
fields.content:
My name is Sam Bull. I'm a Django developer.

I work for a digital interactive agency called [Trapeze](http://www.trapeze.com).

I'm a huge nerd, but don't let that throw you! I'm actually quite likeable. I geek out especially for things like cartoons, role-playing games, animé, sci-fi crap and some hoity-toity comic books (i.e. graphic novels by Neil Gaiman).

I live in Toronto with my boyfriend Patrick, our cool, geeky roommate, and our two cats.

It's a pleasure to meet you.
